snippet: The National Transportation Safety Board said on Thursday that a search turned up the bridge deck of a cargo ship that sank last month off the Bahamas after encountering Hurricane Joaquin.
abstract: National Transportation Safety Board announces Navy remote underwater vehicles have found bridge deck of El Faro, cargo ship that sank off Bahamas during Hurricane Joaquin.
lead_paragraph: The National Transportation Safety Board said on Thursday that a search turned up the bridge deck of a cargo ship that sank last month off the Bahamas after encountering Hurricane Joaquin.

headline.main: Florida: Bridge of Lost Ship El Faro Is Located
headline.print_headline: Florida: Bridge of Lost Ship Is Located
